description: Take every 5th term of Padovan sequence A000931.
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
prog: (MAGMA) I:=[0, 2, 9]; [n le 3 select I[n] else 5*Self(n-1)-4*Self(n-2)+Self(n-3): n in [1..30]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Apr 17 2012
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
extensions: First term corrected by Colin Barker, Feb 02 2012
